about_the_game:
The job of janitor is to clean, including removing graffiti from the surfaces of buildings. But what if he has a creative soul, and once upon a time he was generally a graffiti artist? In this case, you can use this DLC and draw on the panelki walls from the heart. Yes, this will contradict the profession of a janitor, but maybe your drawing will become a landmark of the city, and the housing and communal services will turn a blind eye to this (if they see it at all).

Where can I find graffiti sprays?
Some ̶b̶u̶l̶l̶i̶e̶s̶ artists leave them in the panelki entrances under the stairs. Look there.

How to draw?
You need to select a graffiti spray of any color in your inventory (if you have them) using the mouse wheel and, approaching any wall, click on LMB.
To paint with a large spot, hold down the Shift key.

What graffiti colors can be found?
  • white
  • black
  • red
  • green
  • blue
  • yellow
  • cyan
  • purple

Does it work in multiplayer?
Yes!

Show the world your art by uploading it to the "Illustrations" section of the Steam Community!

name: PANELKI - Graffiti Pack DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Find graffiti sprays and paint graffiti on any buildings. Even in multiplayer!
